item.title: Tasha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "God does not play dice with the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Betty Smith
item.description: "It's a beautiful religion and I wish I understood it more. No, I don't want to understand it all. It's beautiful because it's always a mystery. Sometimes I say I don't believe in God and Jesus and Mary. I'm a bad Catholic because I miss mass once in a while and I grumble when, at confession, I get a heavy penance for something I couldn't help doing. But good or bad, I am a Catholic and I'll never be anything else. Of course, I didn't ask to be born Catholic, no more than I asked to be born American. But I'm glad it turned out that I'm both these things." -- Betty Smith

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stacia Kane
item.description:
"Readers have the right to say whatever the fuck they want about a book. Period. They have that right. If they hate the book because the MC says the word “delicious” and the reader believes it’s the Devil’s word and only evil people use it, they can shout from the rooftops “This book is shit and don’t read it” if they want. If they want to write a review entirely about how much they hate the cover, they can if they want. If they want to make their review all about how their dog Foot Foot especially loved to pee on that particular book, they can."
[<a href="http://www.staciakane.net/2012/01/09/something-in-the-water/">Blog entry, January 9, 2012</a>]" -- Stacia Kane

item.title: Tasha add a quote by William Morris
item.description: "Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful." -- William Morris
